welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kronberg, the charming city known for its picturesque streets, historical landmarks, and beautiful nature. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving a wide range of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, mainly serving Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, set to open in 2023 and increase the airport's capacity by 25 million passengers per year.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a daily time limit of 30 minutes per device. Unlimited access can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
